entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch does not apply changes in razor page #41645
  • WebAPI template Swagger API versioning support #41643
  • Error with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation after updating to 6.0.4/6.0.5 #41642
  • Cleanup ide.host.json files. #41638
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Consider setting PersistenceScope for other template options #41637
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Results.ValidationProblem not including errors in response #41634
  • run restore.cmd failed #41633
  • Razor runtime compilation fails for duplicate types using extern aliases. #41632
  • Visual Studio does not retain 'Do not use top-level statements' check. #41631
    7.0-preview5
  • Quarantine GetWithRouteParameter_WriteMultiple_CancellationBefore_CallCanceled #41629
  • OpenAPI Client Generator, Generating multiple clients named same thing. #41627
  • CSS Isolation & RCL Support does not generate the correct CSS import for WASM Apps not hosted at root #41625
  • Unintuitive/incorrect behaviour from use of WithOpenApi() #41623
  • OpenApiGenerator throws ArgumentException if duplicate response model present for a status code #41622
  • [Blazor] Replacing EditForm Model causes component destruction #41621

Closed

  • Make shadow copy a non-experimental feature #40961
    7.0-preview5
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41532
    7.0-preview5
  • Can't update to packages to 6.0.5, issues with System.IO.Pipelines supporting >= 6.0.3 #41606
  • 'Do not use top level statements' check does not work for Minimal API template. #41636
  • Use interned strings in Hub protocol implementations #41342
    .NET 7 Planning
  • The type or namespace 'Internal' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.AspnetCore.Http'. Are you missing an assembly reference? #41522
  • Using Kestrel server with SignalR client causes hanging requests #41575

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix partial chunked cookies #41646
  • Avoid repeatedly encoding method name strings in protocol #41644
  • [release/6.0] Update SPA templates submodule #41641
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.6
  • Make Mvc Individual auth test fail when useLocalDb is true #41640
    area-mvc
  • Adding API convention to contribute to Endpoint Metadata #41635
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine GetWithRouteParameter_WriteMultiple_CancellationBefore_CallCanceled #41630
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview5
  • Add CancellationToken overloads for reading multipart form sections #41533
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Updating branding & merge internal commits #41617
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • Don't allocate method name strings in protocol #41465
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview5
  • Count forms with invalid content-disposition in FormFeature #41616
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime
  • Surrogate argument list in Minimal APIs #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • HELIX failures investigations #41563
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #41613
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.26
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #41612
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Add dotnet user-jwts tool #41520
    area-commandlinetools
  • Fix templates sourceName & port of template fixes from main #41536
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.6
  • Merge HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 request cookies on Kestrel #41591
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop
  • Improve gRPC JSON transcoding request binding and support HttpBody #41523
    area-grpc
